name: ABNewPersonViewController
desc: A view controller presenting an interface to create a contact.DeprecatedUse CNContactViewController instead.

items.name: var newPersonViewDelegate: ABNewPersonViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate of a new-person view controller.

items.name: protocol ABNewPersonViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: The ABNewPersonViewControllerDelegate protocol declares the interface that ABNewPersonViewController delegates must implement.

items.name: var displayedPerson: ABRecord?
items.desc: Optional. Specifies the person properties that the new-person view controller pre-fills in its views.

items.name: var addressBook: ABAddressBook?
items.desc: Optional. The address book to which the new contact is added.

items.name: var parentGroup: ABRecord?
items.desc: Optional. Specifies the group to which to add the new contact on save.
